name: HoundMebyArgusware
0:
”Alexa, ask hound me who is the best dog in the world.”
”Alexa, ask hound me to set my dogs name to Buddy.”
”Alexa, ask hound me to give a command.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hound me
des: This skill will confirm what you already know, that you have the best dog in the world. It will also give random commands to you favorite pet. You can first tell Alexa your pets name and she will use the name when talking about your pet. This is a product of Argusware Software.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
